citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30 pm on
17-Aug-17. The inspector knocked on the facility door, called the provided contact number, and sat in the driveway
for 45 minutes attempting to contact the licensee. All attempted were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany the inspection process during business hours.
This inspection report was sent by standard mail and email.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30 pm on
17-Aug-17.  The inspector knocked on the facility door, called the provided contact number, and sat in the driveway
for 45 minutes attempting to contact the licensee.  All attempted were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany the inspection process during business hours.
This inspection report was sent by standard mail and email.
